use.flag: 4x anime upscaler. ESRGAN based. Using the HFA2k dataset with OTF (on the fly degradation) jpeg compression and blur.
A photo upscaler without degradation handling. It uses a RRDBNet base model. Trained with the the LSDIR dataset.
A photo upscaler which handles a bit of jpeg compression. It uses SRVGGNET compact model for faster inference times. Trained with the LSDIR dataset.
A photo upscaler which handles a bit of jpeg compression and blur. It uses the RRDBNet base model. Trained with the LSDIR dataset.

A 4k realistic photo upscaler handling jpeg compression. It was trained with the the HAT network (small and large model). Trained with Nomos8k dataset with OTF (on the fly degradation) jpeg compression and blur.
A real world 4X upscaler for JPEG 75 quality and better using ESRGAN.
A real world 4X upscaler for artifact free images using ESRGAN.
Lightweight faster but slightly worst quality of of the default model with a (WDN) Wide and Deep Network model.
Lightweight faster but slightly worst quality of the default model without a (WDN) Wide and Deep Network model.
An optimized anime video model for X2 scaling
An optimized anime video model for X3 scaling
An optimized anime video model for X4 scaling
This model is designed to restore heavily compressed or noisy images. Trained with video game screenshots at 4k.

An model accidently used for Ultrasharp in the 2.0.1 upscayl release.
For image comparison, see https://github.com/upscayl/upscayl/issues/324
